headline.0: Let Girls Lead Video Contest: Maria Josefa Castro Bay
headline.1: Cellulite-Fighting Shapewear Lines Sued For Not Fighting Cellulite

short_description.0: By raising her mother's awareness about girls' rights and getting her involved in community organizing, Maria Josefa Castro Bay was able to convince her mother that education matters. Now, Maria and her mother are working together to promote girls' rights in their Guatemalan community.
